data.message: Why doesn't anyone at Facebook respond to messages sent to this page, to get customer service??? LOL I've sent the same message several times the past few months, and it doesn't look like anyone is even monitoring it!!

replies.message: We hear you, Jesse. This is a great place to ask a question. Let us know how we can help. -Jordan
Facebook My news feed changes back to Top Stories every 5 minutes!! Why won't it stay on Most Recent???

Why is it that on my PC facebook runs very very slow, and the pages take forever to load? I have cable connecton and everything else works just fine. Facebook seems to be very very slow, why? How do I fix this so it doesn't sit here and freeze my computer taking its time to load...
hello Facebook I have a problem when I receive a call on the application facebook messenger; the button to accept and reject the call is not displayed on the screen of my android
Facebook get ppl that like to work would be nice and a place where we can report app and games

Facebook you never help me. the app of messenger suck and now it is the only way to open conversation on mobile phone. But the app seem can't read those message that sent from the computer. It is just a stupid app. Hope the above problem can be solved as soon as possible or please tell me if I made any mistake.

Hi Ka. To help our team investigate any issues you are experiencing, please report them through the app. You can do this by clicking the Profile button in the upper right and selecting "Report a Problem". Thanks for helping us make a better app! -Kevin
Don't bother, Ka. I tried submitting issues and they just get ignored. They have a feedback page, but it never loads.... just cycles endlessly (oh, gosh, gee, must be a mistake, eh?).
